name: Essentialaid.GitHub.io
body:
### Essential Aid's Open Source Efforts.
Essential Aid has several open source projects in the works.  These pages will continue to be updated with additional details in the days ahead.  

### Suggestions
Suggestions are always welcome.  If you are interested in contributing to any of the projects, send us an email.  We will be create some specific guidelines and recommendations on how to best get involved with us in an effective and meaningful way, and with your help and suggestions we will continue to improve and evolve and grow professionally and personally. Our goal is to improve through determined, consistent efforts in every we we can.  We want to improve as a company. We want to grow professionally and personally.  And, we want to expand and improve the way we do things.  We want to improve our ideas.  

https://youtu.be/gnZJjNjMg98?t=1m16s
We want to be better.  In what way?  To loosely paraphrase Khan in Star Trek, in every way.
 
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gnZJjNjMg98" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

One day, we are going to have style guides, guidelines, and documents that do not contain a single reference to star trek.  But, that day is not today.  We want to continue to grow and become better.  
   .   of and we will continue to Suggestions are Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### First steps
Our first steps are to get organized and have a plan.  That plan will entail setting up continuous integration systems, version control for source coed, testing procedures, and of course, the functional design of of what we want to implement.

### Support and Contributors
We greatly appreciate all of the assistance that we receive from our contributors and partners.

https://d2ogrdw2mh0rsl.cloudfront.net/production/images/layout/logo-header.png?1431523238

BrowserStack supports open source development and provides Essential Aid, Inc. a free subscription to their invaluable testing resources.  

Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
